title.narrative: Phase V- Development Partners’ Support to the implementation of the 2nd Growth and Transformation Plan (GTP II) 2016-2020

description.narrative: To provide support to the Government in its effort to reduce poverty and improve the impact of development assistance through enhanced dialogue between the Government and development partners, represented in the Development Assistance Group (DAG)

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Output 9:2. Dialogue between Development Assistance Group and Government of Ethiopia is effective
Follow-up to Development Assistance Group Executive Committee, Head of Agency and Retreat action points implemented
Effective support to the implementation of Growth and transformation plan and the Sustainable Development Goals provided
Monitoring of the second growth and transformation plan indicators including Sustainable Development Goals

target.value: The second growth and transformation plan policy matrix including disaggregated data is monitored

actual.value: Financed strategic studies to facilitate achievement of the second growth and transformation plan. Enabled Ministry of Planning and Development train its staff to enable the institution to do evidence based planning, monitoring and evaluation.

target.value: The second growth and transformation plan policy matrix including disaggregated data is monitored

actual.value: Growth and transformation plan targets with sex-disaggregated data monitored.

title.narrative: By 2020, national and sub-national institutions capacity is strengthened for participatory evidence-based, result-oriented and equity-focused decision making, policy formulation, programme design, monitoring evaluation and reporting.

Enhanced capacity of government institutions and national/regional actors to collect, analyse and utilize socio-economic, gender, environmental, governance and other disaggregated data to formulate equity and evidence-based development policies, strategies, and programmes.

target.value: Number of national/regional policies and strategies revised, analyzed and adopted.

actual.value: The project has facilitated dialogue amongst development partners and financed technical and analytical studies such as Roadmap for the implementation of Addis Ababa Action Agenda, poverty analysis report, 2017 VNR of SDGs and APR of GTP II, Mid-term review of GTP II in 2018 and annual progress report of GTP II in 2019. In addition, DPG Phase V project has supported MPD to prepare the 10-yeardevelopment plan and consult with DPs and other stakeholder to gather feedback on the plan. UK and WB, to alleviate chronic development issues in Ethiopian lowlands, conducted the lowland resilience building study. The project enabled the Ministry to review existing policies, strategies and plans and make recommendations for improved performance on several development sectors and policies.
